doc:
Veronica Cooper https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Veronica_Cooper 0 Veronica Cooper (née Balfe; May 27, 1913 – February 16, 2000) was an American actress who appeared in The Gay Nighties under the name Sandra Shaw. She was the wife of the actor Gary Cooper and mother of painter Maria Cooper Janis. Veronica_Cooper ( née_Balfe ; May_27_,_1913 – February_16_,_2000 ) was an_American_actress who appeared in The_Gay_Nighties under the_name_Sandra_Shaw . She was the_wife of the_actor_Gary_Cooper_and_mother of painter_Maria_Cooper_Janis .
